title: VIP Team 1270 — SDGs: Resilient Infrastructures and Sustainable Innovation
note: Official VIP team page describing project goals, advisors, and research focus areas.

title: MARTA GTFS Static Feed
note: General Transit Feed Specification data including stops.txt, routes.txt, stop_times.txt for transit network topology.

title: ARC 2020 Census Tracts - City of Atlanta
note: Census tract boundaries for demographic overlay and population-weighted accessibility calculations.

title: Atlanta Gentrification and Displacement Map
note: Validated neighborhood change typologies used for displacement risk analysis and model training labels.

title: SDG Indicator 11.2.1 Metadata
note: Official UN-Habitat methodology for measuring 'convenient access to public transport' - defines 500m/1000m thresholds.

title: SDG Indicator 11.7.1 Metadata
note: Methodology for measuring 'average share of built-up area that is open space for public use'.

title: OSMnx: Python Package for Street Networks
note: Used to download and construct walk network from OpenStreetMap for network-based accessibility analysis.

title: Pandana: Pandas Network Analysis
note: High-performance C++ library for network accessibility queries. Uses Contraction Hierarchies for ~30x speedup.

title: Kepler.gl: Large-scale WebGL Geospatial Visualization
note: Interactive dashboard creation tool. Supports large datasets via WebGL rendering and remote URL data loading.

title: spatial-kfold: Spatial Cross-Validation for Python
note: Library for implementing Spatial K-Fold CV to prevent data leakage from spatial autocorrelation in predictive models.

title: Georgia Tech Brand Guide — Colors
note: Official color palette used for portfolio styling: Tech Gold, Navy Blue, accessible variants.

title: Gentrifying Atlanta: Investor Purchases of Rental Housing, Evictions, and Displacement
note: Research on investor activity as a leading indicator of displacement. Informed feature engineering for predictive model.

title: Forecasting Atlanta Gentrification with Transformers
note: Related GT research on gentrification prediction using tax assessor time-series data.

title: USDA Food Access Research Atlas
note: Reference for low-access area measurement methodology. Informed thinking about accessibility thresholds.

title: ARC 21-County Population and Employment Dashboard
note: Demographic data for population-weighted SDG indicator calculations.
